RPKI_CACHE_TIMEOUT.title: Max age in seconds of the RPKI Cached data file
RPKI_CACHE_TIMEOUT.description: How long should the cache file of RPKI information remain valid? After this timeout a newer version will be downloaded. Setting the cache high might result in False positives, but improves performance.

RPKI_SOURCE_URL.title: Source url for RPKI information
RPKI_SOURCE_URL.description: Source url with RPKI information. The boefje expects the same format as used in the default url.

HASHFUNC.title: Hash function
HASHFUNC.descirption: The hashing function used to compute the hash over the downloaded source data.
